options: ['the way to live as the rich', 'the way to sing as the poor', 'the way to dance as the poor', 'the way to sleep as the rich']
article:
A video is very popular on the Internet these days. It's South Korean star PSY's Gangnam style <<style>>  video. He stands above Justin Bieber and becomes the most popular singer on YouTube.
In fact, the video sets the Guinness World Record in YouTube history. Gangnam Style was put onto the Internet on July 15,2012.What's catching the eyes in Gangnam style is PSY's special dance moves, funny horse riding poses and dancing in a towel. Many people may not understand the Korean language, they are still interested in the video
The video also has many different versions now. The song has topped the iTunes charts  in 31 countries, including the United States, United Kingdom, and Canada.
The song tells us the rich people's lifestyle in today's Gangnam Block, South Korea. Psy looks at here as Seoul's Beverly Hills.
